page.title: 18LOCAL ADMINISTRATION.
page.content: The area is governed by{Suffolk {County Council}and,at a more local level,by the Waveney District Council.The{WDC.}is responsible for housing,sport,refuse_collection, recreation and public works.The{SCC. is responsible for welfare service, education,major planning,roads and communications.There are two arms of Local government:the{Regional Water {Authority}deals with all aspects of supplied water and sewage;the {District Health Authority}deals with all hospital services.The constituency covers the same area as the WDC:there are{72,000}electors;the total population is about{100,000}people.A member of Parliament represents the interests of his constituents in Parliament.Every{M.P.}divides his time equally between Parliament and his constituency.
